mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `user` where login_name =#{user.login_name} and user_password=#{user.user_password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, login_name, user_name, user_password, phone, user_status, operator, create_time ) VALUES (#{user.id},#{user.login_name},#{user.user_name},#{user.user_password},#{user.phone},#{user.user_status},#{user.operator},now())
